description.english: Finish the tutorial.
description.french: Terminer le tutoriel.
description.german: Beende das Tutorial.
description.italian: Termina il tutorial.
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial.

description.english: Get maximum score in all tutorial levels.
description.french: Obtenir le score maximum dans tous les niveaux du tutoriel.
description.german: Erreiche den höchsten Rang in allen Tutorial Leveln.
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio massimo in tutti i livelli del tutorial.
description.spanish: Consigue la máx. puntuación en los niveles del tutorial.
description.ukrainian: Отримати максимальну кількість очок на всіх рівнях навчання.

description.english: Finish all levels in the game.
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux du jeu.
description.german: Beende alle Level im Spiel.
description.italian: Termina tutti i livelli del gioco.
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles del juego.

description.english: Get at least a medium score in all levels.
description.french: Obtenir au moins un score moyen dans tous les niveaux.
description.german: Erreiche mindestens einen mittleren Rang in allen Leveln.
description.italian: Ottieni almeno un punteggio medio in tutti i livelli.
description.spanish: Consigue al menos una puntuación media en todos los niveles.
description.ukrainian: Отримати принаймні середню кількість очок на всіх рівнях.

description.english: Get maximum score in all levels.
description.french: Obtenir le score maximum dans tous les niveaux.
description.german: Erreiche den höchsten Rang in allen Leveln.
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio massimo in tutti i livelli.
description.spanish: Consigue la máx. puntuación en todos los niveles.
description.ukrainian: Отримати максимальну кількість очок на всіх рівнях.

description.english: Finish episode 1.
description.french: Terminer l'épisode 1.
description.german: Beende Episode 1.
description.italian: Termina l’episodio 1.
description.spanish: Completa el episodio 1.

description.english: Get maximum score in all levels in episode 1.
description.french: Obtenir le score maximum dans tous les niveaux de l'épisode 1.
description.german: Erreiche den höchsten Rang in allen Leveln in Episode 1.
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio massimo in tutti i livelli dell’episodio 1.
description.spanish: Consigue la máx. puntuación en los niveles del ep. 1.
description.ukrainian: Отримати максимальну кількість очок на всіх рівнях епізоду 1.

description.english: Get maximum score in all levels in episode 2.
description.french: Obtenir le score maximum dans tous les niveaux de l'épisode 2.
description.german: Erreiche den höchsten Rang in allen Leveln in Episode 2.
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio massimo in tutti i livelli dell’episodio 2.
description.spanish: Consigue la máx. puntuación en los niveles del ep. 2.
description.ukrainian: Отримати максимальну кількість очок на всіх рівнях епізоду 2.

description.english: Get maximum score in all levels in episode 3.
description.french: Obtenir le score maximum dans tous les niveaux de l'épisode 3.
description.german: Erreiche den höchsten Rang in allen Leveln in Episode 3.
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio massimo in tutti i livelli dell’episodio 3.
description.spanish: Consigue la máx. puntuación en los niveles del ep. 3.
description.ukrainian: Отримати максимальну кількість очок на всіх рівнях епізоду 3.

description.english: Get maximum score in all levels in episode 4.
description.french: Obtenir le score maximum dans tous les niveaux de l'épisode 4.
description.german: Erreiche den höchsten Rang in allen Leveln in Episode 4.
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio massimo in tutti i livelli dell’episodio 4.
description.spanish: Consigue la máx. puntuación en los niveles del ep. 4.
description.ukrainian: Отримати максимальну кількість очок на всіх рівнях епізоду 4.

description.english: Get S rank in all levels.
description.french: Obtenir le rang S dans tous les niveaux.
description.german: Erreiche den S Rang in allen Leveln.
description.italian: Ottieni il rango S in tutti i livelli.
description.spanish: Consigue una S en todos los niveles.
description.ukrainian: Отримати ранг S на всіх рівнях.

description.english: Die 1000 times.
description.french: Mourir 1 000 fois.
description.german: Sterbe 1000 mal.
description.italian: Soccombi 1.000 volte.
description.spanish: Muere 1000 veces.

description.english: Collect 1000 targets.
description.french: Collecter 1 000 cibles.
description.german: Sammle 1000 Ziele.
description.italian: Ottieni 1.000 nuclei.
description.spanish: Reúne a los 1000 objetivos.

description.english: Self-destruct 100 times.
description.french: Effectuer 100 autodestructions.
description.german: Zerstöre dich 100 mal selber.
description.italian: Autodistruggiti 100 volte.
description.spanish: Autodestrúyete 100 veces.

description.english: Finish 15 levels without touching the ground.
description.french: Terminer 15 niveaux sans toucher le sol.
description.german: Schaffe 15 Level ohne den Boden zu berühren.
description.italian: Termina 15 livelli senza toccare terra.
description.spanish: Completa 15 niveles sin tocar el suelo.

description.english: Beat the game in under 15 minutes.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en moins de 15 minutes.
description.german: Beende das Spiel in unter 15 Minuten.
description.italian: Termina il gioco nell’arco di 15 minuti.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en menos de 15 minutos.
description.ukrainian: Пройти гру менше ніж за 15 хвилин.

description.english: Beat your own time 10 times.
description.french: Battre ton propre score 10 fois.
description.german: Schlage deine eigene Zeit 10 mal.
description.italian: Batti il tuo tempo 10 volte.
description.spanish: Supera tu récord 10 veces.

displayName.spanish: Un huevo de lo más valiente

description.english: Finish the game on normal difficulty.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en difficulté normale.
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf Normal.
description.italian: Termina il gioco alla difficoltà Normale.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en normal.

displayName.german: Die Party ist noch nicht vorbei

description.english: Finish the game on hard difficulty.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en difficulté difficile.
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf Schwer.
description.italian: Termina il gioco alla difficoltà Difficile.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en difícil.

description.english: Finish the game on nightmare difficulty.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en difficulté cauchemardesque.
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf Albtraum.
description.italian: Termina il gioco alla difficoltà Incubo.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en pesadilla.

description.english: Finish every boss level without dying.
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux de boss sans mourir.
description.german: Schaffe jedes Boss Level ohne zu sterben.
description.italian: Termina ogni livello boss senza soccombere.
description.spanish: Completa cada nivel de jefe sin morir.
description.ukrainian: Пройти всіх босів, не вмерши жодного разу.
